body.name: TV Wall Mount Bracket Fixed for Most 26”-65” LED, OLED 4K Flat Screen TVs, Low Profile TV Mount Holds up to 132lbs VESA 400X400mm - Fits 16” Studs - Space Saving by Nuyoah
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 36 mins
features: Universal TV Mount Compatibility - Our wall mount tv bracket fits for 26-65 inch TVs with VESA patterns range from 75x75mm to 400x400mm that holds up to 132lbs TVs, perfect for Panasonic, Sony, Vizio, LG, Sharp, TCL, Samsung, etc. You can freely locate your TV on brick or concrete wall, and simplify the TV placement on 12”/16” wood stud wall. Please make sure you TV VESA, weight and size before purchasing.

Durable & Solid Steel Structure - Manufactured by heavy guage steel and 100% welded by auto-robot, this fixed tv wall mount has high level of strength and durability after 4 times load-bearing test, so that you can rely on this tv wall bracket to mount a TV under 132lbs. The sleek black powder finish adds a modern reinforcing layer to the steel frame, effectively help scratch resistance. Get one tv mount, enjoy a comfortable TV time forever.

Simple, yet intuitive Design - Low profile sits only 0.9" away from the wall to display your flat screen TV like a picture frame. Free up your desktop space and provide a clean and sleek look. This extended size heavy-duty flat TV wall mount meets most of wall mounting needs in a simple and affordable design. It will safely secure your precious flat screen TV to any wall, engineered for superior quality and dependability.

Details Make it Perfect - Features of unique process embossing on wall plate, we use as much high quality steel as possible for both artistic look and practical usage. No worries about tv falling, let alone a mess tv cabinet, our low profle tv wall mount designed with anti-drop raised edge and security latches to prove our pursuit of precision quality. Each tv bracket has been tested for pefect performance.

Install it in a Breeze - Just locate the bolt holes behind your TV and align the horizontal mounting arms with the bolt holes. The mounting arms also have multiple vertical holes to match the vertical positioning of the bolt holes behind your TV. Our tv mounting bracket features an integrated bubble level to make the installation process easier. All necessary instructions and hardware included. Any questions please feel free to contact us !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This tv hanger get the tv very close to the wall which worked great since my husband built me a beautiful frame for it:

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mount came with everything I needed to get a 42” tv on my office wall. The instructions were clear and super simple to follow. It took the hands and help of 2 people to make sure I had everything in a stud or anchored correctly, and it only took like 20min to install. Good value for such a simple product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple basic TV mount
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This is a very basic simple TV mount. It is NOT a twist and turn mount ... once mounted it stays put up against the wall. But it is dependable and does what it says.Would reccomend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY
reviews.reviewText: The final step of mounting your TV on this product is inserting and tightening the “secure screws.” This is impossible. At this point in the steps the TV is up and you have less than an inch to screw a screw into a tiny hole that’s a foot above the edge of the TV. And the hole is blocked by the screws you’re used to attach the brackets to the back of the TV. Even if you had a long enough screwdriver, the screws would be blocked. I’ve mounted at least a dozen TVs and monitors on walls before and have never seen a feature like this. Do not buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Would only recommend if tv it’s not so heavy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Screws are incomplete when it was arrived

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Got my 65 inch up & sturdy I love it 🫶🏽
